00033 using namespace std;

00035 void write_bar(const char *file)
00036 {
00037         affxbarwriter::CBARFileWriter bar;
00038         bar.SetFileName(file);
00039         bar.CreateNewFile();
00040 
00041         TagValuePairType param;
00042         param.Tag="Param1";
00043         param.Value="NoVal";
00044         bar.AddAlgorithmParameter(param.Tag.c_str(), param.Value.c_str());
00045 
00046         // Affy BAR files currently expect 1 int for the position and 1 or more floats.
00047         bar.AddColumn(affxbar::BAR_DATA_INTEGER);
00048         bar.AddColumn(affxbar::BAR_DATA_FLOAT);
00049 
00050         bar.SetNumberSequences(1);
00051         affxbar::BarSequenceResultData data;
00052         srand(999999);
00053         for (int k=0; k<bar.GetNumberSequences(); k++)
00054         {
00055                 affxbar::CGDACSequenceResultItem *p = bar.GetResultsPtr(k);
00056                 p->SetNumberDataPoints(5);
00057                 p->SetName("Seq1");
00058                 p->SetGroupName("Group1");
00059                 p->SetVersion("1.0");
00060                 p->AddParameter("SeqParam1", "NoVal");
00061                 for (int l=0; l<p->GetNumberDataPoints(); l++)
00062                 {
00063                         data.iValue = l;
00064                         p->SetDataPoint(l, 0, data);
00065                         data.fValue = (rand() % 100) + (0.2f * l);
00066                         p->SetDataPoint(l, 1, data);
00067                 }
00068         }
00069 
00070         if (bar.Save() == false)
00071         {
00072                 printf("failed to save file\n");
00073                 return;
00074         }
00075         bar.Close();
00076 }
00077 
00078 void write_cel(const char *file)
00079 {
00080         affxcel::CCELFileWriter cel;
00081         cel.SetFileName(file);
00082 
00083         //cel.CreateNewFile();
00084 
00085 
00086         // Due to a limitation with GCOS, the name of the algorithm must be "Percentile"
00087         cel.SetAlgorithmName("Percentile");
00088         cel.AddAlgorithmParameter("Percentile", "50");
00089         cel.AddAlgorithmParameter("CellMargin", "2");
00090         cel.AddAlgorithmParameter("OutlierHigh", "1.500");
00091         cel.AddAlgorithmParameter("OutlierLow", "1.004");
00092 
00093 
00094         cel.SetMargin(2);
00095         cel.SetDimensions(126, 126);
00096         cel.SetChipType("Test3");
00097         GridCoordinatesType grid;
00098         grid.upperleft.x = 0;
00099         grid.upperleft.y = 0;
00100 
00101         grid.upperright.x = 1000;
00102         grid.upperright.y = 0;
00103 
00104         grid.lowerleft.x = 0;
00105         grid.lowerleft.y = 1000;
00106 
00107         grid.lowerright.x = 1000;
00108         grid.lowerright.y = 1000;
00109 
00110         cel.SetGridCorners(grid);
00111 
00112         cel.AllocateEntries();
00113         affxcel::CELFileEntryType entry;
00114         srand(999999);
00115         for (int ir=0; ir<cel.GetRows(); ir++)
00116         {
00117                 for (int ic=0; ic<cel.GetCols(); ic++)
00118                 {
00119                         entry.Intensity = (float)(rand() % 1000);
00120                         entry.Pixels = 10;
00121                         entry.Stdv = 1.3f;
00122                         cel.SetCellEntry(ic, ir, &entry);
00123                 }
00124         }
00125 
00126         cel.SetMask(0, 0, true);
00127         cel.SetMask(0, 1, true);
00128         cel.SetOutlier(0, 2, true);
00129 
00130         if (cel.WriteXDABCel() == false)
00131         {
00132                 printf("failed to save file\n");
00133                 return;
00134         }
00135         cel.Close();
00136 }
00137 
00138 void write_chp(const char *file, const char *cdfFile)
00139 {
00140         affxcdf::CCDFFileData cdf;
00141         cdf.SetFileName(cdfFile);
00142         cdf.Read();
00143 
00144         affxchpwriter::CCHPFileWriter chp;
00145         chp.SetFileName(file);
00146         if (chp.CreateNewFile() == false)
00147         {
00148                 printf("failed to create a chp file\n");
00149                 return;
00150         }
00151         chp.InitializeForWriting(cdf);
00152         chp.SetParentCelFileName("no_cel.cel");
00153 
00154         // Due to a limitation with GCOS, the name of the alg must be "Stat" for expression arrays.
00155         chp.SetAlgorithmName("Stat");
00156         chp.SetAlgorithmVersion("1.0.02");
00157         chp.AddAlgorithmParameter("p1", "1.0");
00158         chp.AddAlgorithmParameter("p2", "1.1");
00159         chp.AddAlgorithmParameter("p3", "1.2");
00160         chp.AddChipSummaryParameter("s1", "2.0");
00161         chp.AddChipSummaryParameter("s2", "2.1");
00162 
00163         // Due to a limitation with GCOS, the name of the progid must be "GeneChip.CallGEBaseCall.1" for expression arrays.
00164         chp.SetProgID("GeneChip.CallGEBaseCall.1");
00165 
00166         affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults entry;
00167         affxcdf::CCDFProbeSetInformation info;
00168         for (int i=0; i<chp.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets(); i++)
00169         {
00170                 cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(i, info);
00171                 entry.m_HasCompResults = false;
00172                 entry.Detection = i % ABS_NO_CALL;
00173                 entry.Signal = (float)i;
00174                 entry.DetectionPValue = (float) i / chp.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00175                 entry.NumPairs = info.GetNumLists();
00176                 entry.NumUsedPairs = info.GetNumLists();
00177                 chp.SetExpressionEntry(i, &entry);
00178         }
00179 
00180         if (chp.Save() == false)
00181         {
00182                 printf("failed to save the chp file\n");
00183                 return;
00184         }
00185         chp.Clear();
00186 }
00187 
00188 void test_file_writers(std::string file, std::string cdfFile)
00189 {
00190         if (strstr(file.c_str(), ".cel") != NULL || strstr(file.c_str(), ".CEL") != NULL)
00191         {
00192                 write_cel(file.c_str());
00193         }
00194 
00195         else if (strstr(file.c_str(), ".chp") != NULL || strstr(file.c_str(), ".CHP") != NULL)
00196         {
00197                 write_chp(file.c_str(), cdfFile.c_str());
00198         }
00199 
00200         else if (strstr(file.c_str(), ".bar") != NULL || strstr(file.c_str(), ".bar") != NULL)
00201         {
00202                 write_bar(file.c_str());
00203         }
00204 }
